pages.text: The 'Shadow Wizards' are the fourth and final boss in Terramity's progression.$(br2)It can be summoned by using occult fabric on the pedestal found in a Chthonic Cathedral.$(br2)Recommended Gear:$(br) -Void/Hellspec/Conductite armor$(br) -Strong weapons and accessories

Can be summoned by using occult fabric on the pedestal found in a Chthonic Cathedral, and do try to keep the bosses in the arena! Some stuff can mess up if they get too far. The Chthonic Cathedral can be found anywhere on the roof of the Nether.$(br2)Occult fabric can be found in the Chthonic Dungeon.
The Shadow Wizards drop antiprisms when defeated, a necessary item used in crafting for the final metals.
